author: CBC News
title: How this international student fought for $16K in unpaid wages — and won | CBC News
description: An international student in Brampton has won more than $16,000 in unpaid wages after going public with her labour battle with the operators of a local restaurant.
content:
An international student in Brampton has won more than $16,000 in unpaid wages after going public with her labour dispute with the operators of a local restaurant.
